Fail_Safe.display_help: Reichsman's Fail Safe Device has been activated.
Fail_Safe.display_attacker_hit: Your power is being absorbed. Too bad for you!

Resistance.display_help: Doors are immune to Fear, Confuse, Disorient and KnockBack, but their bulk makes them vulnerable to Immobilization.

Explode.display_help: When the Door is destroyed, it tends to explode.

Dampening_Field.display_help: You are being affected by a Dampening Field. It seems unlikely you could teleport out of this prison cell.

12_Gauge.display_help: Good at medium range. Longer range and more deadly than most Shotguns, The 12 Gauge Shotgun Fires a cone of buckshot pellets and can knock some foes down. This shotgun includes small thermite charges mixed into it's shot, sometimes causing the target to burst into flames.

12_Gauge_2.display_help: Good at medium range. Longer range and more deadly than most Shotguns, The 12 Gauge Shotgun Fires a cone of buckshot pellets and can knock some foes down. This shotgun includes small thermite charges mixed into it's shot, sometimes causing the target to burst into flames.

Rifle_Butt.display_help: A smash with the butt of your rifle.
Rifle_Butt.display_target_help: A smash with the butt of your rifle.

Frag_Grenade.display_help: The explosion from the Fragmentation Grenade affects all within the blast and can knock them back.

Missile_Launcher.display_help: This devastating weapon has extreme range capabilities. Its slow recharge and high endurance cost is compensated by its massive explosion and Knockback.

Wolf_Jumping.display_help: Nightwolf can inherently jump real high and travel very fast.

Metamorphosis.display_help: This power is simply the visual fx for a transformed Lycanthrope.

Chill_of_the_Night.display_target_help: The Chill of the Night is doing Negative Damage Over Time to you and reducing your Accuracy.

Fast_Healing.display_help: The Nosferatu naturally heals at a faster than a normal rate. This power is always on and does not need to activated.
Fast_Healing.display_target_help: The Nosferatu naturally heals at a faster than a normal rate. This power is always on and does not need to activated.

Reconstruction.display_help: Nosferatu can concentrate for a few moments to heal himself.
Reconstruction.display_target_help: Nosferatu can concentrate for a few moments to heal himself.

Dull_Pain.display_help: Nosferatu can activate this power to increase his maximum Hit Points for a short time.
Dull_Pain.display_target_help: Nosferatu can activate this power to increase his maximum Hit Points for a short time.

Siphon_Life.display_help: The Nosferatu taps the powers of the netherworld to steal life from you. Your accuracy is reduced due to your weakened state.

Mesmerize.display_target_help: The Nosferatu painfully enraptures your mind with psychic energy rendering you unconscious.

Power_Absorption.display_help: Your power is being absorbed. Too bad for you!
Power_Absorption.display_attacker_hit: Your power is being absorbed. Too bad for you!

Power_Siphon_Tell.display_help: Protean drains the power of nearby foes to recharge himself. Recharge: Slow
Power_Siphon_Tell.display_attacker_attack_floater: Get Away! Protean readies his Power Siphon!

Power_Siphon_Hit.display_help: Protean drains the power of nearby foes to recharge himself.

Barrage.display_help: You perform a quick punch that deals minor damage. Coupled with other energy punches, Barrage can Disorient a foe. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Energy_Punch.display_help: You perform a powerful Energy Punch that deals moderate damage. When used with other Energy Melee attacks, Energy Punch can Disorient your opponent. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Power_Blast.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Bone_Smasher.display_help: A Bone Smasher attack can be slow, but it compensates by dealing a good amount of damage and having a better chance to Disorient than Energy Punch. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Whirling_Hands.display_help: By focusing your energy into the muscles in your arms, you can launch a dizzying flurry of attacks against every foe in melee range. Some foes may be hit hard enough to be Disoriented as well. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Kinetic_Shield.display_help: Kinetic Shield creates a harmonic Energy Aura that can deflect physical attacks. Your Defense to Smashing and Lethal attacks is increased as weapons and powers like bullets, blades and punches tend to deflect off the shield. Kinetic Shield also grants you good resistance to Defense Debuffs. The Energy based nature of Kinetic Shield also offers some minimal Defense to Energy attacks.
Kinetic_Shield.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +DEF(Smashing, Lethal, Energy), Res(DeBuff DEF)
Kinetic_Shield.display_attacker_hit: You Kinetic Shield increased you Defense to Lethal, Smashing, and to some degree, Energy attacks.

Power_Shield.display_help: This Power Shield creates a Electro-Magnetic shield around you that can deflect non-physical attacks. Your Defense to Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy attacks is increased as these attacks are reflected or refracted off the shield. Power Shield also grants you good resistance to Defense Debuffs.
Power_Shield.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +DEF(Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Res(DeBuff DEF)
Power_Shield.display_attacker_hit: You Power Shield increased you Defense to Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy attacks.

Overload.display_help: You can Overload your Energy Aura and dramatically improve your defense to all attack types except Psionic Attacks. Overload also grants you high resistance to Defense Debuffs. This Energy Aura is so powerful, that it can even absorb some damage, effectively increasing your Max Hit Points, However, when Overload wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Extremely Long
Overload.display_short_help: Self +DEF(All but Psionics), +Recovery, +Max HP, Res(DeBuff DEF), +Special
Overload.display_attacker_hit: You are Overloading your Energy Aura. You now have extreme Defense to all attacks except Psionics and your Max HP has been increased.

Jab.display_help: Reichsman has Disoriented you with his Jab.
Jab.display_target_help: Reichsman has Disoriented you with his Jab.

Punch.display_help: Your Super Strength Punch can deal a moderate amount of damage, but most of all can knock your opponent off his feet, unable to attack again until he stands up. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Punch.display_target_help: Your Super Strength Punch can deal a moderate amount of damage, but most of all can knock your opponent off his feet, unable to attack again until he stands up. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Haymaker.display_help: A slow but devastating attack, the Haymaker has a great chance of knocking your opponent down. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Hurl.display_target_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is close ranged, deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Foot_Stomp.display_help: Using your superior leg strength, you can Stomp your foot to the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Foot_Stomp.display_target_help: Using your superior leg strength, you can Stomp your foot to the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Fist_of_Tyranny.display_help: Reichsman strikes you with all the force of a thunderbolt!
Fist_of_Tyranny.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, High DMG (Smashing/Negative Energy) Foe Stun, -Recovery, -End
Fist_of_Tyranny.display_target_help: Reichsman stuns you with his Fist of Tyranny.

Dull_Pain.display_help: You can activate this power to increase your maximum Hit Points for a short time. Recharge: Very Long

Dull_Pain.display_attacker_hit: You {PowerName} and increase your maximum Hit Points.

Unstoppable.display_help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
Unstoppable.display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)
Unstoppable.display_target_help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Jab.display_target_help: Reichsman has Disoriented you with his Jab.

Punch.display_help: Your Super Strength Punch can deal a moderate amount of damage, but most of all can knock your opponent off his feet, unable to attack again until he stands up. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Punch.display_target_help: Your Super Strength Punch can deal a moderate amount of damage, but most of all can knock your opponent off his feet, unable to attack again until he stands up. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Haymaker.display_help: A slow but devastating attack, the Haymaker has a great chance of knocking your opponent down. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Haymaker.display_target_help: A slow but devastating attack, the Haymaker has a great chance of knocking your opponent down. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Hand_Clap.display_help: Reichsman has Disoriented you with his Hand Clap.
Hand_Clap.display_target_help: Reichsman has Disoriented you with his Hand Clap.

Knockout_Blow.display_help: Reichsman has hit you with a Knockout Blow. You are Held.
Knockout_Blow.display_target_help: Reichsman has hit you with a Knockout Blow. You are Held.

Sap_Will.display_help: Reichsman has sapped your will reducing your attack speed!
Sap_Will.display_target_help: Reichsman has sapped your will reducing your attack speed!

Foot_Stomp.display_help: Using your superior leg strength, you can Stomp your foot to the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Foot_Stomp.display_target_help: Using your superior leg strength, you can Stomp your foot to the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Fist_of_Tyranny.display_help: Reichsman strikes you with all the force of a thunderbolt!
Fist_of_Tyranny.display_target_help: Reichsman strikes you with all the force of a thunderbolt!

Dull_Pain.display_help: You can activate this power to increase your maximum Hit Points for a short time. Recharge: Very Long
Dull_Pain.display_target_help: You can activate this power to increase your maximum Hit Points for a short time. Recharge: Very Long
Dull_Pain.display_attacker_hit: You {PowerName} and increase your maximum Hit Points.

Unstoppable.display_help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
Unstoppable.display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)
Unstoppable.display_target_help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
Unstoppable.display_target_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)

Aura_of_Domination.display_help: Reichsman is surrounded by an Aura of Domination, entering the aura will cause you to suffer Psionic damage, have your endurance drained, chance to hit reduced and attack rate decreased.
Aura_of_Domination.display_short_help: PBAoE Aura DMG(Psionic) Foes: -End, -To Hit, -Rech, -Regen, Res(Heals)
Aura_of_Domination.display_target_help: Reichsman is surrounded by an Aura of Domination, entering the aura will cause you to suffer Psionic damage, have your endurance drained, chance to hit reduced and attack rate decreased.

Deafening_Shout.display_help: Reichsman's Deafening Shout has substantially reduced your defenses and resistance.
Deafening_Shout.display_target_help: Reichsman's Deafening Shout has substantially reduced your defenses and resistance.
